amendment.description: Amendment provides for reducing the number of U.S. forces stationed in NATO countries unless those countries agree to increase their contributions to cover nonpersonnel costs associated with the deployment of those forces. The amendment requires host nations to assume 75 percent of such nonpersonnel costs by the year 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease the number of U.S. forces stationed in NATO countries unless those countries agree to increase their contributions to cover nonpersonnel costs associated with the deployment of those forces. The amendment would require host nations to assume 75% of such nonpersonnel costs by the year 1998.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 156 (Roll no. 375).
